config.theexpanse.title: The Expanse Config
config.theexpanse.option.mod_enabled.too:
When disabled, the mod lays dormant and does nothing.
§cGame restart required!
config.theexpanse.option.snow_start_offs: Offsets the y-level snow in cold biomes like Taigas starts at.
Vertically stretches terrain above sea level. Doubling this value will double the surface's height at a given point from sea level.
config.theexpanse.option.increased_heigh: Increases the max build and generation height to y640.
config.theexpanse.option.lava_tunnels.to: Rare, deep underground tunnels of lava sometimes generate at the bottom of the world.
config.theexpanse.option.ocean_offset.to:
Skews terrain towards or away from oceans. Lower values = more oceans.
§cAbove -0.45, deep oceans will not spawn!
§4Above -0.2, oceans will not spawn!
config.theexpanse.option.continents_scal: Horizontally scales continents. Lower values = larger continents and oceans between them.
config.theexpanse.option.erosion_scale.t: Horizontally scales erosion, primarily impacting mountains. Lower values = thicker mountain ranges and terrain between them.
config.theexpanse.option.ridge_scale.too: Horizontally scales the ridge noise, primarily impacting rivers and terrain around them like plateaus. Lower values = wider rivers and terrain between them.
config.theexpanse.option.underground_riv: Rivers that reach mountain ranges continue underground, allowing smoother boat exploration.
Underground rivers will rarely generate with hanging lanterns.
config.theexpanse.option.flat_terrain_sk: The threshold where plateau terrain becomes flatter terrain. Positive numbers make flat terrain more common and negative numbers make plateau terrain more common.
config.theexpanse.option.rolling_hills.t: Some Plains biomes generate very smooth, hilly terrain.
Some jungles generate massive pillars that can extend upwards of a hundred blocks tall.
config.theexpanse.option.enabled.tooltip:
Islands with vanilla mountainous terrain dot the oceans.
§6With Terralith installed, these spawn volcanoes!
config.theexpanse.option.noise_scale.too: Horizontally scales islands. Lower values = larger islands and oceans between them.
config.theexpanse.option.ocean_depth.too: 0 is at sea level, -0.5 is 64 blocks below sea level.
config.theexpanse.option.deep_ocean_dept: 0 is at sea level, -0.5 is 64 blocks below sea level.
config.theexpanse.option.monument_offset: Offsets (vanilla) ocean monuments to adjust for deeper oceans.
config.theexpanse.option.remove_frozen_o: Removes the surface ice from Frozen Oceans, making them as navigable as Deep Frozen Oceans.
config.theexpanse.option.temperature_mul: Multiplies the temperature noise, causing extreme cold/warm biomes (snowy biomes, deserts) to be favored.
config.theexpanse.option.temperature_sca: Horizontally scales the temperature noise. Lower values = larger distance between biomes of different temperatures.
config.theexpanse.option.vegetation_mult: Multiplies the vegetation noise, causing extreme dry/humid biomes (sunflower plains, dark forests) to be favored.
config.theexpanse.option.vegetation_scal: Horizontally scales the vegetation noise. Lower values = larger distance between biomes of different humidities (e.g. savannas and jungles).
